# Design System Generator - Project Setup

This is a custom Design System Generator built with modern web technologies.

## Architecture
- Monorepo managed by Turborepo
- Apps: generator (main UI), docs (Astro documentation)
- Packages: ui (React components), tokens (design tokens)
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- Component preview: Storybook

## Stack
- Frontend: React + TypeScript + Vite
- Documentation: Astro
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- Monorepo: Turborepo
- Components: Storybook

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all code
- Follow React best practices
- Use Tailwind for styling
- Keep components reusable and documented
